page.title: 08LOCAL NEWSPAPERS
page.content:
The newspapers in our area are{The {Coleraine Chronicle}and{The Tribune}. These are printed outside Ballycastle but they are the only papers with our local news. Recently a monthly magazine, "Moyle Monthly" has been published which consists of 4_6 pages of local events, but it has ceased publication.
The two main events this week are a suspect bomb and a priest's{Golden {Jubilee. } The bomb was suposed to be in a beer keg in a car. This was found to be empty. Also this week a Roman-Catholic Parish Priest celebrated {50 years}in the priesthood.
